name: Drow
description: Drow are dark-skinned elves with a slender build, skilled in stealth and magic. They are often found wielding poisoned weapons, dressed in light armor suitable for quick movements.
memorable: Drow are known for their cunning, manipulation, and use of poisons in combat, making them formidable opponents in the Underdark.
goals: Drow typically seek power and favor from their dark goddess Lolth, often engaging in betrayal and intrigue.
relations: Drow may be encountered with other Underdark creatures such as demons or beasts, or as rival factions within their own society.
environment: They thrive in the dark, treacherous caves of the Underdark.
strengths: Drow excel in stealth and ambush tactics, using their darkvision to navigate and attack in darkness effectively.
weaknesses: Drow have a significant vulnerability to sunlight, which hampers their effectiveness.
attacks: Drow are adept with shortswords and hand crossbows, often inflicting poison upon their targets.
most_powerful_ability: Poison Weapon allows the drow to coat a weapon in poison, inflicting debilitating effects on its target.
senses: Drow possess darkvision, allowing them to see in complete darkness up to 120 feet.
skills: The drow has a high Stealth score, enabling them to remain hidden and surprise their enemies.
additional_information: Drow are influenced by a strict hierarchy in their society ruled by female priestesses.
They can innately cast spells such as darkness and faerie fire.
Drow culture is marked by betrayal and power struggles.
spellcasting: Drow can innately cast dancing lights at will and darkness or faerie fire once per day.
